sentences.sentence: An insider said, "Katharine has told friends it is time to end her career."
sentences.translation: 一名知情者说，“凯瑟琳告诉朋友们她该结束自己的职业生涯了。”

sentences.sentence: A realistic look at the crimes reveals that the offender is likely to be an employee of the firm against which the crime has been committed, i.e., an "insider".
sentences.translation: 从现实角度来看待这些罪行，就会发现，犯罪者很可能是受害公司的雇员，即“内部人员”。

sentences.sentence: But a realistic look at the crimes reveals that the offender is likely to be an employee of the firm against which the crime has been committed, i.e., an "insider".
sentences.translation: 但是，从现实的角度来看待本次罪行，犯罪分子很可能是反公司的公司雇员，即“内部人员”。
